column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A man suspected of drunken driving smashed into a kindergarten wall.------The incident occurred at 11 pm on April 8
column5: in front of the International Kindergarten along 287th/558th Streets in Boeng Kak 1
column6: Khan Toul Kork.------According to sources from the scene
column7: a man was drunk before driving a silver FORD ECOSPORT vehicle
column9: traveling southbound on 287 very quickly. ------The driver lost control and hit the wall
column10: causing extensive damage. He immediately got out of the vehicle and fled the scene.------After the incident
column11: local authorities arrived to inspect and towed the vehicle to be kept at the Toul Kork Police Inspectorate to await the owners to come to a legal resolution. ------POST NEWS
